t: Amazon Brand Detector Extension: Find Out How Many Brands Amazon Owns
s: May 21, 2024 - With the Amazon Brand Detector extension, you can quickly and easily determine how many brands Amazon owns. This is a great tool for keeping track of the ever-growing empire of Amazon and its subsidiaries. The extension is free to use and easy to install, so there's no reason not to try it out.
